Function reference

version 0.50.0

R package overview

The functions of the spacemap R package are perhaps best conceptualized in three categories. The model fitting category concerns functions that learns a network from input data for a given set of parameters. The model selection category encompasses functions that select the optimal parameters of spacemap for a specific dataset. The last category is network analysis, which contains tools to annotate and interpret model output.

Model fitting

Details on how to fit spacemap and space with selected tuning parameters.

spacemap

Fit the spacemap model.

space

Fit the SPACE model.

Model selection

cvVote

Cross validation (CV.Vote) for spacemap and space models.

tuneVis

Visualize cross validation metrics

initFit

Identify scale of tuning penalties

bootEnsemble

Ensemble networks through boostrapping.

bootVote

Model aggregation through Boot.Vote

Network Analysis Toolkit

neta

Network analysis toolkit

Simulation

sim1

Simulation 1
